name: Portainer
description: Monitors the Portainer management container and restarts it if inactive.
check_cmd: if command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1; then if docker ps --format '{{.Names}}' | grep -q '^portainer$'; then echo ok; else echo fix; fi; else echo ok; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1; then docker start portainer 2>/dev/null || docker restart portainer 2>/dev/null || true; fi
verify_cmd: sleep 3; if docker ps --format '{{.Names}}' | grep -q '^portainer$'; then echo ok; else echo fail; fi
